text: Kapillayuq (Quechua chapel (a borrowing from Spanish capilla), -yuq a suffix to indicate ownership,Shimikunata asirtachik killka, Inka-Castellanu, Diccionario Inga-Castellano, Serie Linguística Peruana No. 52 "the one with a chapel", also spelled Capillayoc) is a mountain in the Andes of Peru. It is located in the Junín Region, Huancayo Province, Chongos Alto District. Kapillayuq lies east of Walsa and west of the lake named Ñawinqucha.escale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL map of the Huancavelica Province 1 (Huancavelica Region) ==References== Category:Mountains of Junín Region Category:Mountains of Peru
title: Kapillayuq
